form.name: firm_swelling_on_head_bruises_or_swelling_on_buttocks
form.page_subtitle: PNC Diagnostic Newborn: Other Serious Conditions, Birth Injury & Abnormalities> Firm Swelling on Head, Bruises or Swelling on Buttocks

field.name: Firm Swelling on Head, Bruises or Swelling on Buttocks | Take Action
Counsel mother not to massage swelling area or put warm compress on swelling on the side of the head
Advise mother to go to the health center or hospital if swelling gets bigger
